content: This is the FHIR Developer Days 2016 channel for the Community track.
Not strictly FHIR related: Preparing my slides I was wondering if the projector will allow for 16:9 slides?

Hi @Jens Stockhausen the projectors support a resolution of 1980x1080 pixels (16:9) with HDMI connectors and optional Mac minidisplay converter plugs. All speakers will also receive an e-mail with detailed information.

Hi @Michel Rutten! Thanks for the
heads up.

As the track lead for the Community track I hope to welcome you to the various presentations. The aim of the Comunity track is to allow FHIR implementers to share their implementation best practices. We have an interesting list of speakers, about FHIR based projects, FHIR implementation details, and FHIR tools that assist an implementer.
The agenda of the track can be found here: http://www.fhirdevdays.com/schedule/track-community/
All presentations will be video recorded and these recordings will be made available in due time.

Hi! Just got the Speakers Introduction. As I was expecting to talk about FHIR from our point of view I already prepared my slides based on our company template (16:9) . Do you really expect me to change it to the plain FHIR template (4:3) a few days before the conference?
The projectors are full HD, so you can use 16:9 slides. If you could just alter the theme to look like the plain template, you should be okay.
@Ren√© Spronk Thanks for the info, will all presentations from the conference be recorded or only all the community track ones?

@Daniel Mediavilla All presentations will be recorded (sometimes one goes missing due to technical glitches), and will be made available in due time. Initially the recordings will only be available to the conference attendees, but with some delay (something like a month) they'll be made available to a wider audience as well. See https://vimeo.com/channels/hl7fhir for videos from the previous DevDays.
Hi, I can't seem to be able to access the Dropbox link to upload the slides...
Page loads, but it's just plain white, no content.
Oh wait, it's just loading super slow. I think I managed :)
I was not actually able to upload anything to that folder, just tells me "empty folder" and no action item. So uploaded them to my Public folder and emailed the links. üòè
Yes, same here, but I've been able to add the folder to my dropbox and then place the files into the folder in my filesystem and it synced back
not sure if that's how it's supposed to work or if I just hacked it :D
Sounds more like you got it and I deserve a n00b ribbon...
I'm bringing mine on a USB stick. Twentyfirst century sneakernet...
Can someone provide a Link to the slide template, please? The one in the PDF isn't working for me
Should be able to grab one of the presentations from the dropbox
Are the presentation slides going to be shared somewhere?
Yes - I believe they're being released to all attendees. Someone from Furore can comment on the intended timeline
Was too early with my question; the shared it thru email. Slides are on Slideshare http://www.slideshare.net/DevDays
